description:
The ultimate attachment for a mess-free espresso wherever your heart desires. The Nanopresso adapter adds the ability to use Nespresso pods and get a consistent espresso every time.

  • Made with stainless steel and plastic to keep weight down and durability up
  • Uses Nespresso® original capsules and compatible products for barista level brews
  • Easy clean up with recyclable aluminum pods and compostable grounds
name: Wacaco Wacaco Nanopresso NS Adapter
